info.title: Project 1 API
info.description: Send forward your gaming community using Project 1 API

post.description: Authenticates the user against the DB.

parameters.name: authRequest
parameters.description: Credentials object to authenticate

200.description: User has been successfully logged in

get.summary: Get all users
get.description:
Gets `User` objects.
Optional query param of **size** determines
size of returned array

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of array

post.description: Adds new `User` object to the DB.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User object to insert

200.description: User has been successfully added to the DB

get.summary: Gets the specified user
get.description: Gets `User` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID to search for.

get.summary: Gets the corresponding matching user
get.description: Gets `User` object specified by its username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of User to search for.

put.summary: Updates the corresponding user basic properties
put.description: Update `User` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to update.

parameters.name: userObject
parameters.description: User object that will update the old one.

put.description: Update password attr of `User` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to update.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Object containing old password (to verify before updating) and new one to update

put.description: Update email attr of `User` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to update.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: New email to update

put.description: Deactivate `User` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to deactivate.

get.summary: Verify user email
get.description: Verify user email

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email to verify

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: token to verify for this email

get.summary: Check if user email is verified
get.description: Check if user email is verified

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: User email to verify

post.summary: Creates a new user based on his email address
post.description: Adds new `User` object to the DB based on its email

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User's email to base user's creation on

200.description: User has been successfully added to the DB

get.summary: Verify user's email before starting registration process (step 0)
get.description: Verify an user based on his email and token

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email to verify and register

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Token to verify this email

put.summary: Updates the corresponding registering user basic properties (step 1)
put.description: Update registering `User` object specified by its userId.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to update.

parameters.name: registerUserObject
parameters.description: User object that will update the old one.

get.summary: Check if user email is verified
get.description: Check if user email is verified

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: User email to verify

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Token to verify this email

put.summary: Completes the registration of the given user
put.description: Delete fields accRegisterToken and accRegisterTokenExpires from the given user

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to update.

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Registration token to verify user can perform action

delete.summary: Cancels the registration of the given user
delete.description: Delete the given user from DB

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to remove.

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Registration token to verify user can perform action

200.description: User has successfully been removed from DB

get.summary: Get all addresses from DB
get.description: Gets all `Address` objects from DB.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of array

post.summary: Adds a new Address to the User
post.description: Adds new `Address` object to the `User` object to the DB.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to update.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address object to add to the User object

200.description: User has been successfully added to the DB

get.summary: Get all addresses of the specified user from DB
get.description: Gets all `Address` objects of the specified User from DB.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of array

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to search addresses for.

get.summary: Get the corresponding `Address` object from DB
get.description: Gets the `Address` object specified byt its ID.

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: addressId of Address object to search for.

put.description: Update `User` object address specified by its ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to update.

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: addressId of Address to add in User object addressList.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address object of User object to update.

put.description: Deactivates `Address` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: addressId of `Address` object to update.

get.summary: Gets all games
get.description:
Gets `Game` objects.
Optional query param of **size** determines
size of returned array

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of array

post.description: Adds new `Game` object to the DB.

parameters.name: game
parameters.description: Game object to insert

200.description: Game has been successfully added to the DB

get.summary: Get the specified game
get.description: Gets `Game` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: gameId of Game object to search for.

get.summary: Get the corresponding game based on the game name
get.description: Gets `Game` object specified by its name.

parameters.name: gameName
parameters.description: Game's name to search for.

get.summary: Get the games for user with given userId
get.description: Gets `Game` objects for which user with given userId has at least one registered player account

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: user Id of user to search for.

put.description: Update `Game` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: gameId of Game object to update.

parameters.name: gameObject
parameters.description: Game object that will update the old one.

put.description: Deactivates the 'Game' object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: gameId of Game object to deactivate.

get.summary: Get all PlayerAccounts
get.description:
Gets `PlayerAccount` objects.
Optional query param of **size** determines
size of returned array

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of array

post.description: Adds new `PlayerAccount` object to the DB.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of player object to add.

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: gameId of player object to add.

parameters.name: PlayerAccount
parameters.description: PlayerAccount object to insert

200.description: PlayerAccount has been successfully added to the DB

get.summary: Get the specified PlayerAccount
get.description: Gets `PlayerAccount` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAcountId of PlayerAccount object to search for.

get.summary: Get the playerAccounts related to the given game for the given user
get.description: Gets `PlayerAccount` objects related to the given game for the given user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to search for.

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: gameId of the Game object to search for.

get.summary: Get the corresponding PlayerAccount based on the PlayerAccount UserId
get.description: Gets `player` object specified by its UserId.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of PlayerAccount object to find.

get.description: Gets `player` object specified by its login.
get.summary: Get the corresponding PlayerAccount based on the PlayerAccount login

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: login of PlayerAccount object to find.

put.description: Updates the 'PlayerAccount' object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAccountId of PlayerAccount object to update.

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: new login of PlayerAccount object to update.

put.description: Deactivates the 'PlayerAccount' object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAccountId of PlayerAccount object to deactivate.

get.summary: Get all PlayerAccountProperty of all PlayerAccounts
get.description:
Gets all `PlayerAccountProperty` objects of all PlayerAccounts.
Optional query param of **size** determines
size of returned array

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of array

200.description: An array of all PlayerAccountProperty of all PlayerAccounts

get.summary: Get PlayerAccountProperty based on the given PlayerAccountPropertyId
get.description: Get PlayerAccountProperty based on the given PlayerAccountPropertyId

parameters.name: playerAccountPropertyId
parameters.description: _id of the PlayerAccountProperty object to retrieve.

put.summary: Update the value for the given PlayerAccountProperty with the given PlayerAccountPropertyId
put.description: Update the value for the given PlayerAccountProperty object specified by its PlayerAccountPropertyId

parameters.name: playerAccountPropertyId
parameters.description: _id of PlayerAccountProperty object to update.

parameters.name: playerAccountPropertyObject
parameters.description: PlayerAccountProperty object that will update the old one.

delete.summary: Delete the given PlayerAccountProperty with the given playerAccountPropertyId
delete.description: Delete the given PlayerAccountProperty object specified by its playerAccountPropertyId

parameters.name: playerAccountPropertyId
parameters.description: _id of PlayerAccountProperty to remove.

get.summary: Get all PlayerAccountProperty with existing given key from all PlayerAccounts
get.description:
Gets all `PlayerAccountProperty` objects with existing given key from all PlayerAccounts.
Optional query param of **size** determines
size of returned array

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of array

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: key of PlayerAccountProperty to search occurrences for

200.description: An array of all PlayerAccountProperty with existing given key from all PlayerAccounts

get.summary: Get all PlayerAccountProperty with existing given value from all PlayerAccounts
get.description:
Gets all `PlayerAccountProperty` objects with existing given value from all PlayerAccounts.
Optional query param of **size** determines
size of returned array

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of array

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: value of PlayerAccountProperty to search occurrences for

200.description: An array of all PlayerAccountProperty with existing given value from all PlayerAccounts

get.summary: Get all PlayerAccountProperties of the given PlayerAccount
get.description: Get all PlayerAccountProperty objects of the given PlayerAccount

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAccountId of PlayerAccount linked to the PlayerAccountProperty objects to retrieve.

200.description: An array of all PlayerAccountProperty of the given PlayerAccount

get.summary: Get the values for the given PlayerAccountProperty key of the given PlayerAccount
get.description: Get the value(s - if more than one occurrence of the property identified by the given key) for the given PlayerAccountProperty object of the given PlayerAccount

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAccountId of PlayerAccount linked to the PlayerAccountProperty objects to retrieve.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: key of PlayerAccountProperty to retrieve

get.summary: Get the PlayerAccountProperty where value corresponds to the given value for the given PlayerAccount
get.description: Get the PlayerAccountProperty (could be more than one if it's the case) where value corresponds to the given value for the given PlayerAccount

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAccountId of PlayerAccount linked to the PlayerAccountProperty objects to retrieve.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: value of PlayerAccountProperty to search for

200.description: An array of all PlayerAccountProperty that match the value for the given PlayerAccount

get.summary: Get the PlayerAccountProperties for the given game
get.description: Get the PlayerAccountProperties for the given game

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: gameId of Game to retrieve corresponding PlayerAccountProperty keys.

200.description: An array of all PlayerAccountProperty keys of the given game

post.description: Adds new `PlayerAccountProperty` object to the DB.

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAccountId of PlayerAccount linked to the PlayerAccountProperty object to add.

parameters.name: playerAccountProperty
parameters.description: PlayerAccountProperty object to insert

200.description: PlayerAccountProperty has been successfully added to the DB

put.summary: Update the values for the given PlayerAccountProperty key of the given PlayerAccount
put.description: Update the value for the given PlayerAccountProperty object specified by its key for the given PlayerAccount

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAccountId of PlayerAccount linked to the PlayerAccountProperty objects to retrieve.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: key of PlayerAccountProperty to update value

parameters.name: playerAccountPropertyObject
parameters.description: PlayerAccountProperty object that will update the old one.

delete.summary: Delete the values for the given PlayerAccountProperty key of the given PlayerAccount
delete.description: Delete the value for the given PlayerAccountProperty object specified by its key for the given PlayerAccount

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAccountId of PlayerAccount linked to the PlayerAccountProperty objects to retrieve.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: key of PlayerAccountProperty to remove

get.summary: Gets all teams
get.description:
Gets `Team` objects.
Optional query param of **size** determines
size of returned array

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of array

post.description: Adds new `Team` object to the DB.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to add as owner

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: gameId of game object to add.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: Team object to insert

200.description: Team has been successfully added to the DB

put.summary: Adds a player to a team
put.description: Adds new `PlayerAccount` object to the given team's players.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: teamId of team object to update

parameters.name: playerAccountId
parameters.description: playerAccountId of PlayerAccount object to add to the team.

200.description: PlayerAccount has been successfully added to the team

get.summary: Get the specified team
get.description: Gets `Team` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: teamId of Team object to search for.

get.summary: Get the specified teams for the given user and the given game
get.description: Gets `Team` objects for the given user and the given game.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of User object to search for.

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: gameId of Game object to search for.

get.summary: Get the corresponding game based on the team name
get.description: Gets `Team` object specified by its name.

parameters.name: teamName
parameters.description: Team's name to search for.

put.description: Update `Team` object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: teamId of Team object to update.

parameters.name: teamObject
parameters.description: Team object that will update the old one.

put.description: Deactivates the 'Team' object specified by its ID.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: teamId of Game object to deactivate.
